#' =====================================================
#' AICc code for Fecundity~RunTimingGroup models
#' =====================================================

### Loading Data
```{r}
rm(list = ls())
library(AICcmodavg)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)

#data loading, use the bodysize_pc data because it will be a variable of interest
lowerriver_bodycomp_PCscores <- "lowerriver_bodycomp_PCscores.csv"

# Import the data. Be sure to check the structure of the data and that R is reading continuous and categorical variables appropriately.
DataSet<-read.csv(lowerriver_bodycomp_PCscores)[,-1]
```

### Removing NAs and subsetting female fish for fecundity
```{r}
### Removing NAs that will mess up levels / model weight
any(is.na(DataSet$Collection_Location))
any(is.na(DataSet$RunTimingGroup))
any(is.na(DataSet$Year))
any(is.na(DataSet$Sex)) # All false

DataSetF <- subset(DataSet, Sex == "F")

```

## Calculating Fecundity for the DataSetF 
```{r}
# values i have for fecundity are # of eggs in a subsample and weight of eggs in a subsample-- so I think best to calculate #/g and then average the three subsamples 

DataSetF$Fecun_num_by_wt1 <- DataSetF$Fem_Fecun_1_num/DataSetF$Fem_Fecun_1_wt
#unsure if there is enough of 2 and 3 subsamples to find averages as necessary, so just use the first sub sample here

# View DataSet.
head(DataSetF)
summary(DataSetF)
nrow(DataSetF)
str(DataSetF)

#make response variables factors
DataSetF$Collection_Location <- as.factor(DataSetF$Collection_Location)
DataSetF$RunTimingGroup <- as.factor(DataSetF$RunTimingGroup)
DataSetF$Year<- as.factor(DataSetF$Year)
str(DataSetF) #collection_rivermile_m is numeric
```

### Making Models for fecundity~RunTimingGroup, includes collection location
```{r}
# Models for reference
fecundity_RTG_modelset <- "fecundity_runtiminggroup/fecundity~RunTimingGroup_modelset.csv"

ModelSet<-read.csv(fecundity_RTG_modelset)

model1 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~1, data=DataSetF)
model2 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc, data=DataSetF)
model3 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + EnergyPDry_1, data=DataSetF)
model4 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + RunTimingGroup, data=DataSetF)
model5 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + Year, data=DataSetF)
model6 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + EnergyPDry_1, data=DataSetF)
model7 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc*EnergyPDry_1, data=DataSetF)
model8 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + RunTimingGroup, data=DataSetF)
model9 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc*RunTimingGroup, data=DataSetF)
model10 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + Year, data=DataSetF)
model11 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc*Year, data=DataSetF)
model12 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + EnergyPDry_1 + RunTimingGroup, data=DataSetF)
model13 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + EnergyPDry_1*RunTimingGroup, data=DataSetF)
model14 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + EnergyPDry_1 + Year, data=DataSetF)
model15 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + EnergyPDry_1*Year, data=DataSetF)
model16 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + RunTimingGroup + Year, data=DataSetF)
model17 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + EnergyPDry_1 + RunTimingGroup, data=DataSetF)
model18 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + EnergyPDry_1 + Year, data=DataSetF)
model19 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + RunTimingGroup + Year, data=DataSetF)
model20 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location +  EnergyPDry_1 + RunTimingGroup + Year, data=DataSetF)
model21 <- lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + EnergyPDry_1 + RunTimingGroup + Year, data=DataSetF)

```

### AICc Model Selection
```{r}
AIC(model1, model2, model3, model4, model5, model6, model7, model8, model9, model10, model11, model12, model13, model14, model15, model16, model17, model18, model19, model20, model21)

#table of AIC results
mynames1 <- paste("model", as.character(1:21), sep = "")
models <- list(model1, model2, model3, model4, model5, model6, model7, model8, model9, model10, model11, model12, model13, model14, model15, model16, model17, model18, model19, model20, model21)

# Generate AIC table
myaicc1 <- aictab(models, modnames = mynames1)
print(myaicc1)
# Convert AIC table to a data frame for easier manipulation
aic_df <- as.data.frame(myaicc1)
aic_df$ModelName <- c("Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + EnergyPDry_1",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + EnergyPDry_1 + RunTimingGroup",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + EnergyPDry_1 + Year",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + EnergyPDry_1",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location +  EnergyPDry_1 + RunTimingGroup + Year",
                      "lm(Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + EnergyPDry_1 + Year",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + EnergyPDry_1 + RunTimingGroup",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc*EnergyPDry_1",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + Year",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + Year",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + EnergyPDry_1 + RunTimingGroup + Year",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + EnergyPDry_1*RunTimingGroup",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + EnergyPDry_1*Year",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + RunTimingGroup + Year",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + RunTimingGroup + Year",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc*Year",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + RunTimingGroup",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc + RunTimingGroup",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~Collection_Location + bodysize_pc*RunTimingGroup",
                      "Fecun_num_by_wt1~1")
colnames(aic_df)[colnames(aic_df) == "Modnames"] <- "Model #"

# Write the data frame to a CSV file
write.csv(aic_df, file = "fecundity_runtiminggroup/AICresults_fecundity~RunTimingGroup.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```
